channel.title: Evolutionary on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Evolutionary on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Evolutionary Dating
item.description: Goal Structure Ask groups of students to investigate online dating. Schedule Form groups of students. Ask each group to search for dating ads, preferably without pictures Define clear goal: short hookups vs long term relationships? Define good sampling - better to have data from multiple websites. Each member searches for about 10 ads. Do content analysis on those ads. Try to put results into some presentation/poster form. Discussion Followup
